submenu.title: Python Packages
submenu.info: Install Python Packages (for Python-2 and Python-3)
submenu.item: opkg install xz opkg install gzip opkg install ar opkg install zip opkg install wget opkg install curl opkg install hlsdl opkg install python-lxml opkg install python-requests opkg install python-beautifulsoup4 opkg install python-cfscrape opkg install livestreamer opkg install livestreamersrv opkg install python-six opkg install python-sqlite3 opkg install python-pycrypto opkg install f4mdump opkg install python-image opkg install python-imaging opkg install python-argparse opkg install python-multiprocessing opkg install python-mmap opkg install python-ndg-httpsclient opkg install python-pydoc opkg install python-xmlrpc opkg install python-certifi opkg install python-urllib3 opkg install python-chardet opkg install python-pysocks opkg install python-lzma

opkg install nano opkg install wget opkg install curl opkg install astra-sm opkg install dvbsnoop opkg install ffmpeg opkg install enigma2-plugin-extensions-clearmem opkg install enigma2-plugin-extensions-cacheflush opkg install enigma2-plugin-extensions-chromium2 opkg install qtwebengine opkg install enigma2-plugin-drivers-ntfs-3g opkg install enigma2-plugin-drivers-exfat opkg install gstplayer libgstplayer-1.0-0 opkg install exteplayer3 opkg install livestreamer opkg install livestreamersrv opkg install libusb-1.0-0 opkg install libssl1.0.2 opkg install libcurl4 opkg install libpcsclite1 opkg install libcrypto1.0.2 opkg install enigma2-plugin-systemplugins-serviceapp opkg install --force-reinstall enigma2-plugin-systemplugins-serviceapp opkg install gstreamer1.0-plugins-good opkg install gstreamer1.0-plugins-base opkg install gstreamer1.0-plugins-bad opkg install gstreamer1.0-plugins-ugly opkg install gstreamer1.0-plugins-bad-meta opkg install enigma2-plugin-systemplugins-softcamstartup # TeamBlue opkg install enigma2-plugin-systemplugins-softwaremanager # Openpli 8.3

opkg install wget opkg install curl opkg install python3-lxml opkg install python3-requests opkg install python3-beautifulsoup4 opkg install python3-cfscrape opkg install livestreamersrv opkg install python3-six opkg install python3-sqlite3 opkg install python3-pycrypto opkg install f4mdump opkg install python3-image opkg install python3-imaging opkg install python3-argparse opkg install python3-multiprocessing opkg install python3-mmap opkg install python3-ndg-httpsclient opkg install python3-pydoc opkg install python3-xmlrpc opkg install python3-certifi opkg install python3-urllib3 opkg install python3-chardet opkg install python3-pysocks opkg install python3-js2py opkg install python3-pillow opkg install pytho3-backports-lazma

opkg install python3 nano opkg install python3 wget opkg install python3 curl opkg install python3 astra-sm opkg install python3 dvbsnoop opkg install python3 ffmpeg opkg install enigma2-plugin-extensions-clearmem opkg install enigma2-plugin-extensions-cacheflush opkg install enigma2-plugin-extensions-chromium2 opkg install python3 qtwebengine opkg install enigma2-plugin-drivers-ntfs-3g opkg install enigma2-plugin-drivers-exfat opkg install python3 gstplayer libgstplayer-1.0-0 opkg install python3 exteplayer3 opkg install python3 livestreamer opkg install python3 livestreamersrv opkg install python3 libusb-1.0-0 opkg install python3 libssl1.0.2 opkg install python3 libcurl4 opkg install python3 libpcsclite1 opkg install python3 libcrypto1.0.2 opkg install enigma2-plugin-systemplugins-serviceapp opkg install --force-reinstall enigma2-plugin-systemplugins-serviceapp opkg install python3 gstreamer1.0-plugins-good opkg install python3 gstreamer1.0-plugins-base opkg install python3 gstreamer1.0-plugins-bad opkg install python3 gstreamer1.0-plugins-ugly opkg install python3 gstreamer1.0-plugins-bad-meta

submenu.title: Check
submenu.item: # Check internet connectivity if ping -q -c 1 -W 1 google.com >/dev/null; then echo "> internet: connected" sleep 3s else echo "> internet:no connection" sleep 3s fi

submenu.title: Fix
submenu.item: opkg update opkg install python3-sqlite3 opkg install python3-requests opkg install python3-libcurl4 opkg install python3-beautifulsoup4 opkg update && opkg install wget
opkg update opkg install python3-sqlite3 opkg install python-requests opkg install python-sqlite3

item.name: Backup & Restore
item.info: ØªØ®Ø²ÙŠÙ† ÙˆØ§Ø³ØªØ¹Ø§Ø¯Ø© Ù†Ø³Ø®Ù‡ Ø§Ø­ØªÙŠØ§Ø·ÙŠØ© Ù…Ù† ajpanel

submenu.title: Restore Settings Menu
submenu.item: WORD='xtraEvent'; BACKUP='/hdd/AJPanel_Backup/settings_backup_xtraEvent'; SETF='/etc/enigma2/settings'; TF='/tmp/tmpFile'; grep -v $WORD $SETF > $TF && cat $BACKUP >> $TF && init 4 && sleep 3 && mv -f $TF $SETF && init 3

WORD='PermanentClock'; BACKUP='/hdd/AJPanel_Backup/settings_backup_PermanentClock'; SETF='/etc/enigma2/settings'; TF='/tmp/tmpFile'; grep -v $WORD $SETF > $TF && cat $BACKUP >> $TF && init 4 && sleep 3 && mv -f $TF $SETF && init 3

WORD='gins.ap'; BACKUP='/hdd/AJPanel_Backup/settings_backup_AudioPlus'; SETF='/etc/enigma2/settings'; TF='/tmp/tmpFile'; grep -v $WORD $SETF > $TF && cat $BACKUP >> $TF && init 4 && sleep 3 && mv -f $TF $SETF && init 3

WORD='weathermsn'; BACKUP='/hdd/AJPanel_Backup/settings_backup_weathermsn'; SETF='/etc/enigma2/settings'; TF='/tmp/tmpFile'; grep -v $WORD $SETF > $TF && cat $BACKUP >> $TF && init 4 && sleep 3 && mv -f $TF $SETF && init 3

WORD='blue'; BACKUP='/hdd/AJPanel_Backup/settings_backup_blueMetal_skin'; SETF='/etc/enigma2/settings'; TF='/tmp/tmpFile'; grep -v $WORD $SETF > $TF && cat $BACKUP >> $TF && init 4 && sleep 3 && mv -f $TF $SETF && init 3

WORD='hotkey.green'; BACKUP='/hdd/AJPanel_Backup/settings_backup_opli_hotkey.green'; SETF='/etc/enigma2/settings'; TF='/tmp/tmpFile'; grep -v $WORD $SETF > $TF && cat $BACKUP >> $TF && init 4 && sleep 3 && mv -f $TF $SETF && init 3

WORD='hotkey.green'; BACKUP='/hdd/AJPanel_Backup/settings_backup_opvix_hotkey.green'; SETF='/etc/enigma2/settings'; TF='/tmp/tmpFile'; grep -v $WORD $SETF > $TF && cat $BACKUP >> $TF && init 4 && sleep 3 && mv -f $TF $SETF && init 3

WORD='VWeather3'; BACKUP='/hdd/AJPanel_Backup/settings_backup_VWeather3'; SETF='/etc/enigma2/settings'; TF='/tmp/tmpFile'; grep -v $WORD $SETF > $TF && cat $BACKUP >> $TF && init 4 && sleep 3 && mv -f $TF $SETF && init 3

fromDir="/media/hdd/Opkg-tools+Zip/bin/" ; toDir="/bin" ; cp -f $fromDir $toDir && chmod -R 755 $toDir ; fromDir="/media/hdd/Opkg-tools+Zip/lib/" ; toDir="/lib" ; cp -f $fromDir $toDir && chmod -R 755 $toDir
